name: The Guide
description: A calm and gentle figure stands here, radiating a quiet confidence. They offer a warm smile.
dialogue: What is one piece of evidence that supports your thought? And what is one piece that contradicts it?

name: The Echo of Doubt
description: A flickering, shadowy figure darts around theedges of the room, muttering in a critical tone. It seems to be made of shifting doubt.
dialogue: You'll probably fail, so why even try? You always mess things up.

name: The Curator
description: A calm, holographic figure shimmers softly. It seems to be a guide for this place, a curator of consciousness.
dialogue: Welcome. You are at the beginning of a journeyâ€”the unfolding of a self. This path explores how we learn to perceive, think, and connect, not just with the world, but with ourselves. Each step is a stage of growth. Observe, and proceed when you are ready.
